welcome_message_body: Welcome to Anaheim, the charming city known for its magical theme parks and vibrant entertainment scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Troy's Burgers
restaurants.description: Troy's Burgers is a burger joint located in Orange.
restaurants.address: 404 E Lincoln Ave (btwn N Glassel St & N Orange Olive Rd), Orange, CA 92865

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Orange.
restaurants.address: 2585 N Tustin St (btwn E Heim Ave & E Lincoln Ave), Orange, CA 92865

restaurants.name: Flappy Jack's Pancake House
restaurants.description: Flappy Jack's Pancake House is a breakfast spot located in Orange.
restaurants.address: 2848 N Santiago Blvd (at E Lincoln Ave), Orange, CA 92867

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Orange.

restaurants.name: Blake's Place BBQ
restaurants.description: Blake's Place BBQ is a bbq joint located in Anaheim.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Municipal Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and parking area for these types of flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines, United Airlines, and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta Air Lines, WestJet, and Frontier Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as JetBlue, Southwest Airlines, and Sun Country Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial airlines and features a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and small aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Aeromexico and Volaris.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
